name: Mixersapp
overview:
Mixers, disruptive for the old-fashioned online dating industry, makes the outdated, slow and textual way of meeting people online irrelevant! Today, online first-time communication between individuals prevents the opportunity to obtain a real-life first impression. The Twitter generation is all about agility, speed, social connections and fun and this is exactly what Mixers finally gives them. Mixers creates a focused and a personal one-on-one live video chats, allowing consumers to use their social skills and meet relevant partners to their needs.

Mixers unique features and attributes Unique user experience – fast and taking advantage of human social capabilities –Video chats Learning algorithm, improvement of the matching over time and usage 3 level’s matching algorithm: Rigid criteria’s Personality traits Crowed wisdom: Collaborative filtering (CF) and Peer based learning
